definition: to sympathize/to pity/to feel compassion for
Kangxi radical 61 (心) as a vertical side element
to bemoan the state of the universe and pity the fate of mankind
to take pity on/to feel sorry for

sentences.english: Often think of my mission, Yan sad sympathetic, Vientiane, including Benjamin.
sentences.chinese: 每每想到自己的使命，就悲欣交感，万象悯含。

sentences.english: God's mercy is only for the chosen few.
sentences.chinese: 只有少又被拣选的人才得到神的悯。

to feel compassion for/to pity on/to feel sorry for
